渽字的基本解释

渽
zāi
〔渽水〕今中国四川省大渡河的古称。

渽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zāi］
［《廣韻》祖才切，平咍，精。］
水名。也称“涐”。就是现在的大渡河。《广韵·平咍》：“渽，水名，出蜀。”《汉書·地理志上》：“渽水出徼外，南至南安，東入江。”《水经注·江水一》：“吕忱曰：'渽水出蜀，許慎以為涐水也。'”一説“涐”的讹字。

渽字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渽； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页635第20
【廣韻】將來切【集韻】祖才切，?音哉。水名。【前漢·地理志】水出蜀郡汶江縣徼外。【集韻】或作?。

渽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
渽字的起名意思

暂无。

渽
Basic explanation of words
渽
zāi
[Lushui] The ancient name of the Dadu River in Sichuan Province, China today.
渽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zāi］
["Guangyun" Zucai cut, flat 咍, fine. ]
Water name. Also called "涐". It is now the Dadu River. "Guangyun·Pingshu": "Lu, the name of the water, out of Shu." "Han Shu·Geography 1": "Lushui flows out of Yuwai, south to Nan'an, and east into the river." "Shui Jing Zhu·Jiangshui 1" "Lu Chen said:'Lushui is out of Shu, Xu Shen thought it would be water.'" When he said "Chan" was an error.
渽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　渽; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 635 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Will cut in the future [Ji Yun] The ancestors will cut,? Sound. Water name. [Pre-Han·Geography] Water flows out of Wenjiang County, Shu County. [Ji Yun] Or make?.
渽

渽
Name meaning
Nothing.
zāi
〔～水〕今中国四川省大渡河的古称。
